name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
